fields.name: Conditions
fields.description: The conditions to evaluate to determine if the automation rule should be triggered on a given object

fields.name: ExpirationTimeUtc
fields.description: Determines when the automation rule should automatically expire and be disabled.

fields.name: IsEnabled
fields.description: Determines whether the automation rule is enabled or disabled.

fields.name: TriggersOn
fields.description: The type of object the automation rule triggers on

fields.name: TriggersWhen
fields.description: The type of event the automation rule triggers on
